text: HEK293T cells were grown on 0 , 01 % poly - L - lysine coated coverslips and analyzed 24 hours post - transfection with DNAs coding : IFITMs , HIV - 1 Gag - Pol plus non - structural viral proteins , NL4 - 3 Env , a miniviral genome coding CD8 , as well as a small amount of Gag - GFP ( ratio 3 : 1 : 1 : 1 : 0 , 1 ) . After Formalin fixation , cells were incubated with the following antibodies : anti - Flag ( F7425 , Sigma ) , followed by DyLight 649 - conjugated sheep , or FITC - conjugated goat anti - rabbit IgG ( STAR36D649 AbD serotec and FI - 1000 Vector ) . DAPI - containing mounting medium was finally used ( DAPI Fluormount G , Southern biotech ) . Images were acquired using a spectral Leica sp5 and analyzed with the Fiji software [ 54 ] . Two - dimensional graphs representing pixel intensities ( gray level ) were plotted along a 30μm lines ( yellow on Figure 3B ) , using Plot Profile tool in Image - J . The extent of reciprocal co - localization between Gag and IFITMs was quantified using the Manders overlap coefficient ( Fuji image software ) on more than 40 cells per condition .
